attributes.action: Review the feasibility of extending the A65 Settle bypass in North Yorkshire to bypass the villages of Long Preston and Hellifield; thus reducing congestion, noise and associated safety implications of high speed vehicle and pedestrian interaction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Review the feasibility of extending the A65 Settle bypass in North Yorkshire to bypass the villages of Long Preston and Hellifield; thus reducing congestion, noise and associated safety implications of high speed vehicle and pedestrian interaction.
